identification_area.title: Texas Tech University, Department of Agricultural Engineering

modification_detail.description: Initial creation of the context product.

external_reference.reference_text: Darwish, M., (1991) Threshold Friction Velocity: Moisture and Particle Size Effects, MS Thesis, Dept. Agricultural Engineering, Texas Tech University.

facility.name: Texas Tech University, Department of Agricultural Engineering
facility.description:
Historically the Department of Agricultural Engineering c. 1991, at Texas Tech University, Lubbock. **No longer a stand-alone department, Agricultural Engineering is rolled into other programs at TTU.
Likely places to contact: Texas Tech University Whitacre College of Engineering, Lubbock, TX http://www.depts.ttu.edu/coe/
or National Wind Institute, Texas Tech University, Lubbock, TX http://www.depts.ttu.edu/nwi/
